title: Full Stack Developer
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive Restaurant Management System using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) for efficient restaurant operations.
Built responsive and interactive frontend interfaces with React.js, incorporating features like menu management, order tracking, table reservations, and real-time dashboards.
Implemented robust backend services with Node.js and Express.js, including RESTful APIs for inventory management, staff scheduling, billing, and reporting.
Integrated MongoDB for scalable data storage, handling complex schemas for menus, orders, inventory, customer data, and analytics.
Developed features for POS (Point of Sale) integration, online ordering, payment processing, and third-party delivery service APIs.
Optimized application performance, ensuring fast load times, real-time updates with WebSockets, and mobile responsiveness for both admin and customer-facing interfaces.
Collaborated with the founding team in an Agile startup environment to iterate on product features based on user feedback and market needs.
Implemented secure authentication, role-based access control, and data validation to ensure system reliability and compliance.
Utilized Git for version control and deployed the application on cloud platforms, focusing on scalability for growing restaurant clients.
